component.name: N
component.description: Set of nodes in the graph

definition.description: Foundational graph structure for representing node-edge relationships with labeling

formal-spec.content: connected(G) ⇔ ∀n₁, n₂ ∈ N: ∃ path from n₁ to n₂

formal-definition.content: traverse(n, depth) = {n' ∈ N : distance(n, n') ≤ depth}

component.name: content
component.description: Document content (text, structured data, or binary)

component.name: meta
component.description: Document metadata including author, timestamps, tags

component.name: render
component.description: Rendering function from content to visual representation

definition.description: Structured content representation with metadata and rendering capabilities

component.name: symbols
component.description: Set of symbolic variables and constants

component.name: ops
component.description: Set of operations applicable to symbols

definition.description: Formal symbolic computation with evaluation and simplification

formal-spec.content: ∀s ∈ S, env: eval(simplify(s), env) = eval(s, env)

formal-definition.content: evaluate(s, env) = match s with | Var(x) → env(x) | Op(f, args) → f(map(λa.evaluate(a, env), args))

operation.name: Substitute
operation.signature: substitute(s: S, x: Symbol, val: S) → S

definition.description: Structured metadata definitions with type safety and validation

formal-spec.content: ∀f ∈ fields, v: valid(f, v) ⇒ typeof(v) = types(f)

operation.name: Validate
operation.signature: validate(data: Data, schema: M) → Result⟨Valid, Errors⟩

formal-definition.content: validate(data, schema) = if ∀f ∈ schema.fields: validators(f, data[f]) then Valid else Errors

operation.name: Transform
operation.signature: transform(data: Data, from: M, to: M) → Data

formal-definition.content: transform(data, from, to) = map_fields(data, from.fields, to.fields)

definition.description: Temporal state tracking with differencing and rollback capabilities

component.name: parser
component.description: Parse input format to structured data

formal-spec.content: compose([f, g, h]) = f ∘ g ∘ h

formal-definition.content: execute(i, p) = fold_left(λacc f. f(acc), i, p.stages)
orchestrate(t, A) = merge({dispatch(coordinator(t, a)) | a ∈ A})
notify(e) = if trigger(e) then deliver(format(e), channel(format(e))) else skip
get(mv) = if fresh(mv.cache) then mv.cache else refresh(mv)

component.name: ops
component.description: Queue of operations from all users

formal-definition.content: handle(e) = match recover(diagnose(e)) with | Success(r) → Ok(r) | Failure → Err(escalate(e))
update(p, v) = if validate(p, v) then edit(p, v) else error
close(d) = documents := documents \ {d}; if focus = d then focus := next_document

formal-spec.content: ∀r₁, r₂ ∈ results: i < j ⇒ rank(r₁) ≥ rank(r₂)

formal-definition.content: route(r) = if auth(r) then forward(transform(r), routes[r.path]) else unauthorized
allow(c) = if count(c) < limit then true else false
call(s) = match state with | Closed → try_call(s) | Open → fail_fast | HalfOpen → test_and_decide(s)
set(k, v) = if |store| = MAX_SIZE then evict(lru); store[k] := v

formal-spec.content: ∀s, a: reducer(s, a) produces same result

formal-definition.content: resize(p, Δ) = p.size := p.size + Δ; adjacent.size := adjacent.size - Δ
display() = if condition() then show(message, actions, illustration) else hide
toggle() = state := if state = Open then Closed else Open
handle(k) = if k in bindings then execute(bindings[k]) else pass_through
drop(e, z) = if validate(e, z) then move(e, z) else cancel
save(v) = if valid(v) then value := v; mode := View else error
next() = if validate(current_step) then current := current + 1 else error
call(a) = cancel(timer); timer := setTimeout(λ.execute(fn, a), delay)
call(a) = if now - last_call ≥ interval then execute(fn, a); last_call := now else skip
migrate(t) = if t > current then up(t) else down(t)
run(t) = fixture := setup(); result := execute(fixture); assert(result); teardown(fixture)
test(s) = system := integrate(components); result := execute(system, s); verify(result)
test(f) = execution := simulate(f); result := verify(execution); report(result)
onToken(t) = buffer.push(parse(t)); if parseable(buffer) then render(build_ast(buffer))

component.name: user_model
component.description: Model of user needs and expertise

manifestation.name: Contextual Help
manifestation.description: Help appears when AI predicts need

manifestation.name: Intelligent Tooltips
manifestation.description: Tooltips appear based on predicted need

formal-spec.content: handoff is atomic: succeeds or fails entirely

operation.name: Handoff
operation.signature: handoff(from: Agent, to: Agent, ctx: Context) → Result

formal-definition.content: handoff(f, t, c) = transfer(c, t); if verify(c, t) then success else rollback
assign(r, a) = agent.roles := agent.roles ∪ {r}; notify(a, r)

formal-spec.content: execute(ca) succeeds entirely or rolls back entirely
∀a₁, a₂: depends(a₂, a₁) ⇒ execute(a₁) before execute(a₂)

formal-definition.content: intervene(c) = if trigger(c) then at_time(timing(prepare(c)), execute(prepare(c)))
notify(n) = if should_interrupt(n, context(user)) then interrupt(n, mode(n, context)) else defer(n)
onComplete(t, r) = tasks := tasks \ {t}; notify(t, r)
anticipate(c) = predicted := predict(c); if confidence(predicted) > threshold then prefetch(prepare(predicted))
onAction(a) = if a in cache then use_cached(a) else fetch(a)

formal-spec.content: supports both input and output via voice

formal-definition.content: execute(a) = cmd := recognize(a); visualize(cmd); if confirmed then execute(cmd); confirm(result)
